CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 26, 1959, pg. B2, reads: "In Celebration of Pittsburgh's Bicentennial - Pa. Training School Marks 'Pioneer Day' - Pioneer Ladies - Girl students at Pennsylvania Training School, Canonsburg, joined last Saturday in various performances designed to demonstrate the manner in which the ladies of America's pioneer days entertained and enjoyed themselves. It is said several theatrical scouts were hanging around the edge of the crowd looking for talent. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Young women wearing gingham skirts, and young men, dancing on field for "Pioneer Day" celebration at Pennsylvania Training School, Canonsburg
